around to get a nice edge the end if you make the patches rug please send me its photo with some details about yourself like your name and where you re from i m curious to know how far my designs travel www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com check out my other rugs http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/p/portfolio html the chart depicts one repeat out of the whole circle you may think of it as a thin triangular pizza slice it is read from the bottom right corner upwards and to the left i ve put a pair of eyes in the bottom-right corner with arrows to indicate the direction of work magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com
